ai-patthana8.4:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.4:1.1_0: Not cause or reasoning or reason, there is no cause or condition for the sake of teaching,
ai-patthana8.4:1.1_1: Not cause or reasoning or reason, there is no cause or condition for the sake of teaching, nor for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana8.4:1.1_2: (They are) not caused by the reason why sometimes they don’t arise with cause or reason, nor with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana8.4:3.1_0: Not for the sake of cause or reason, or for the sake of not cause or reason, there is no cause or reason,
ai-patthana8.4:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana8.4:4.1_0: Nine kinds of objection for nine objects ...
ai-patthana8.4:5.1_0: Or also in the same way, the question of  is the same as the matter.
